full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I NOR SGRUB BYED TSUL RIG 'DZIN ZHAL LUNG RIN CHEN DBANG GI RGYAL PO'I DO SHAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B (ZHES RATNA'I GTER BYON NOR SGRUB SNYING GI DUM BU LAS 'BYUNG @011A *, ,BA LTAR, DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I NOR SGRUB BYED TSUL RIG 'DZIN ZHAL LUNG RIN CHEN DBANG GI RGYAL PO'I DO SHAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, SNGAGS 'CHANG CHEN PO PADMA RDO RJE DANG, BSKAL BZANG RDO RJE GNYIS NAS BKRA SHIS PA'I LHA DAR DANG GSER GYI ME TOG BCAS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENGGE 'AM MING GZHAN PADMA RGYAL PO RTZAL GYIS HOR ZLA BCU PA'I DKAR PHYOGS KYI RGYAL BA DANG PO'I GZA' SKAR 'PHROD SBYOR PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I SNGA DRO'I DUS TSOD DGE BAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI MDZOD PA CHOS @011B RJE'I TSA BO BSTAN PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BGYIS PA DZA YANTU,, ,,)
